name: Brave Little Bird
description:
SEARCH FOR YOUR MOM, USE HER LAST FEATHER TO GLIDE

The little bird has not yet learnt to fly. One day, a big gust of wind takes the little bird away. Waking up in a far-away land, he finds one of his mother's feathers in the ground, and uses it to glide. Now, the fragile but couragous little bird must find his way back home. 

CONTROLS

  • A and D Keyboard Keys / Left and Right Arrows to move
  • Space key to jump
  • CTRL key to activate / deactivate glide mode (Only after getting the feather)

FEATURES

  • Use the feather to glide across the level
  • Take advantage of the wind to uprise
  • Destroy special blocks to progress in the level
  • Gather some collectibles spread across the map
